post:
Hello from Ho-ost! We've received a great response since our migration to North Carolina and IPv6 introduction. So we've expanded into Chicago, Illinois.  We have multiple templates or upload an ISO! Our Virtual Servers are using the Virtualizor Control Panel, and all include an IPv4 address. Upon request, we can assign you IPv6 addresses - Just put in a ticket! 99.99% Uptime Included!

<pre>

$12.50/Quarter With Code 2QLET
</pre>
